name: Shooter Game (itch) (WildestBeast)
description:
A 3DS Homebrew made in a week. The project was made me as a test if I could program something for the 3DS in C. There's no audio in this game unfortunately, but I'm planning on adding it later in life.

The game is my first game I fully finished. I started programming in 2019 and first started out with the Unity Game Engine. It's "Playable", "Fun", and "Works Perfectly".

Although It has a lot of flaws, I'm very proud that I finished it.
